benchmark_details.name: Galician Alpaca Dataset
benchmark_details.overview: The paper presents a Galician adaptation of the Alpaca dataset, which consists of 52,000 instructions and demonstrations aimed at enhancing Natural Language Processing for the Galician language.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enhance NLP for the Galician language through an adapted dataset and fine-tuned language model.

data.source: Translation of the Alpaca dataset to Galician using googletranslatepy.

methods: Fine-tuning the model using the adapted dataset
methodology.calculation: Training was conducted for 20 epochs, with loss recorded for each epoch.
methodology.interpretation: Lower loss values indicate better model performance.
methodology.validation: Validation set comprises 20% of the dataset held back from training.
